All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.EventListener, org.eclipse.jface.dialogs.IDialogPage, org.eclipse.jface.dialogs.IMessageProvider, org.eclipse.jface.preference.IPreferencePage, org.eclipse.swt.events.FocusListener, org.eclipse.swt.internal.SWTEventListener, org.eclipse.ui.IWorkbenchPreferencePage
public class PropertiesPreferencePage
extends org.eclipse.jface.preference.PreferencePage
implements org.eclipse.ui.IWorkbenchPreferencePage, org.eclipse.swt.events.FocusListener

Preference page for the configuration of user defined properties.

Modified version of the LayoutPreferencePage in de.cau.cs.kieler.kiml.ui by msp.

Author:
soh
